text: Kevin K. McAleenan (born September 5, 1971) is an American attorney and former government official who served as the Acting Secretary of Homeland Security from April 2019 through November 2019. McAleenan resigned on October 11, 2019, with Trump stating that McAleenan wanted to "spend more time with his family and go to the private sector." ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1971 births Category:Living people Category:United States Secretaries of Homeland Security Category:People from Honolulu
title: Kevin McAleenan
